introTypewriter: Get a short info about me
paragraph1: Hello, I am Ahmadaliyev Zafarbek. I was born in 2008 in Qiyali neighborhood, Baliqchi district, Andijan, Uzbekistan and still live here.
paragraph2: Programming is a process that excites me because it requires not only creative thinking but also teaches finding the most efficient solution for every problem.
paragraph3: If you get interested in programming, you spend sleepless nights thinking about new apps. It's like a passion, not a disease.
projectsIntro: If you want to see my created projects, visit the Projects page.
